poem.author: Langston Hughes
poem.title: April Rain Song
verses: Let the rain kiss you </br> Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops. </br> Let the rain sing you a lullaby.
The rain makes still pools on the sidewalk. </br> The rain makes running pools in the gutter. </br> The rain plays a little sleep-song on our roof at nightâ€” </br>
